description: Number of pair-coverings with largest block size 3.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. G. Stanton, J. L. Allston and D. D. Cowan, Pair-coverings with restricted largest block length, Ars Combin., 11 (1981), 85-98.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
